translation.msg_start:
Hi, I am your Runes wallet & red envelope(RE) assistant.
How to create and send RE?
== STEP 1. Snatch RE in groups or deposit Runes to your wallet address.

== STEP 2. Create a RE.
/create [Amout] [Count]
e.g. /create 1000 5
Create RE in this private chat.

== STEP 3. Send the RE you created to a group or to a friend.  Add me to the group before send RE into it.
/send [No.]
e.g./send 1003
translation.msg_help:
Commands available in private chat
/start
Show welcome message and dashboard.

/wallet
Show your wallet balance.

/create [Amout] [Count]
Create a RE.
e.g., /create 1000 5

/list
Show all REs that you created.

/send [No.]
Send a RE in a chat with Omnity RE Bot..
e.g., /send XXXXXX

/revoke [No.]
Revoke a RE in a chat with Omnity RE Bot..
e.g., /revoke XXXXXX

/help
Show full command list.
translation.msg_how_to_create:
Create RE command:

/create [Amount] [Count]
e.g. /create 500 5

Add F flag can create fix amount RE
e.g. /create 500 5 F

You can also add blessing text of up to 140 characters
e.g. /create 500 5 F Good luck in new year!
translation.msg_how_to_transfer:
Transfer command:

/transfer [Amount] [Address]
e.g. /transfer 100 du3eh-nms77-f6msf-6ucqy-ltj4o-fg4ah-ao4ky-t5bpy-w6khb-4egvg-dqe

Add  ICP flag to indicate you want to transfer $ICP other than Runes
e.g. /tranfer ICP 100  du3eh-nms77-f6msf-6ucqy-ltj4o-fg4ah-ao4ky-t5bpy-w6khb-4egvg-dqe
translation.msg_wallet_notice: You can mint and cross-chain transfer HOPE•YOU•GET•RICH at https://www.runescan.net/runes/431, or deposit from other ICP wallets. Note that while this custodial wallet is easy to use, it is not suitable for storing large amounts of assets.
translation.msg_snatch_suffix: Play with RE by chatting with me! @{{botname}}
translation.msg_send: Select the user or group you want to send to
translation.msg_send_user: RE is sent to your friend successfully
translation.msg_send_group: RE is sent to the group successfully
translation.msg_create_minimum: The minimum amount of each RE shouldn't not be less than {{amount}}
translation.msg_send_failed_user:
You shared RE failed. He/She is not a friend with Omnity REBot.

Share Omnity REBot @{{botname}} with your friends
translation.msg_send_failed_group:
You shared RE failed. Omnity REBot @{{botname}} is not in the group.

Share Omnity REBot @{{botname}} to group administrators
translation.reapp_error_1101: The token is not in the whitelist
translation.reapp_error_1102: The expiration time is too short
translation.reapp_error_1103: The token allowance is not enough
translation.reapp_error_1109: The RE {{id}} has been snatch up
translation.reapp_error_1113: The RE {{id}} cannot be withdrawn until it expires (24 hours)
